s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: This workflow performs a 'multiple' multiple sequence alignment and phylogenetic analysis.

s:processor.name: Get_Proteins_FASTA
s:processor.s:description:
Given a sequence or sequence entry identifer return the sequence in fasta format.
If a sequence identifier is input the EBI's WSDbfetch web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/dbfetch) is used to retrive the sequence in fasta format. Otherwise the input is assumed to be a sequence and if passed through the Soaplab EMBOSS seqret service to force the sequence into fasta format.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription:
Given a sequence or sequence entry identifer (e.g. uniprot:wap_rat), return the sequence in fasta format.
If a sequence identifier is input the EBI's WSDbfetch web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/dbfetch) is used to retrive the sequence in fasta format. Otherwise the input is assumed to be a sequence and if passed through the Soaplab EMBOSS seqret service to force the sequence into fasta format.

s:processor.name: Fail_if_sequence
s:processor.s:description: Fails if the workflow input was a sequence (i.e. is an identifer).

s:processor.name: Fail_if_identifer
s:processor.s:description: Fails if the workflow input is an identifier (i.e. is an actual sequence).

s:beanshell.s:scriptvalue:
//StringBuffer in = new StringBuffer();
String out = in.toString();

s:processor.name: Is_sequence
s:processor.s:description: Return true if the input is a sequence or false if the input is a sequence identifer (e.g. uniprot:wap_rat).

s:workflowdescription.author: Mariana de Oliveira Braga Teixeira Monteiro
s:workflowdescription.title: Get-Protein-FASTA

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: This workflow performs a generic protein sequence analysis. In order to do that a novel protein sequence enters into the software along with a list of known protein identifiers chosen by the biologist to perform a homology search, followed by a multiple sequence alignment and finally a phylogenetic analysis.

s:metadata.s:description: Either an actual sequence or an entry identifer.

s:processor.name: ClustalW2
s:processor.s:description: Given a set of sequences perform an multiple sequence alignment and from the multiple alignment derive a phylogenetic tree. The popular ClustalW program (see http://www.clustal.org/), as implemented in the EBI's WSClustalW2 service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2) is used to perform both tasks.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Given a set of sequences perform an multiple sequence alignment and from the multiple alignment derive a phylogenetic tree. The popular ClustalW program (see http://www.clustal.org/), as implemented in the EBI's WSClustalW2 service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2) is used to perform both tasks.

s:processor.name: ClustalW_phylogenetic_tree
s:processor.s:description: Create a phylogenetic tree from the alignment.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Create a Neighbor-joining phylogenetic tree, with Kimura distance corrections, from a sequence alignment using the EBI's WSClustalW2 service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2).

s:processor.name: Get_phylip_tree_result
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: Get_nj_tree_result
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: Get_output
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: runClustalW2
s:processor.s:description: Submit a ClustalW analysis job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#runclustalw2_params_content)

s:processor.name: EBI_ClustalW2_poll_job
s:processor.s:description: Wait for job to finish.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Check status of job.

s:processor.name: Success
s:processor.s:description: If job not finished fail.

s:processor.name: Is_done
s:processor.s:description: Map job status into true/false is done flag

s:processor.name: checkStatus
s:processor.s:description: Get the status of a submited job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#checkstatus_jobid)

s:metadata.s:description: EBI job identifier for the job to check.
Status of the job.
A sequence alignment in an appropriate format (e.g. fasta, clustalw or MSF).
User's e-mail address.
EBI job identifier.
Output from the ClustalW program. Useful for diagnosing problems.
The phylogenetic tree in PHYLIP format, for use with tree drawing tools.
Description of the tree.

s:processor.name: ClustalW_alignment
s:processor.s:description: Align the sequences.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Perform a ClustalW multiple sequence alignment using the EBIâ€™s WSClustalW2 service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2). The set of sequences to align are the input, for the other parameters see Job_params.

s:processor.name: runClustalW2
s:processor.s:description: Submit a ClustalW analysis job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#runclustalw2_params_content)

s:processor.name: Get_output_result
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: Get_alignment_result
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: Get_guide_tree_result
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: EBI_ClustalW2_poll_job
s:processor.s:description: Check for job status, and wait if job not finished.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Check status of job.

s:processor.name: Success
s:processor.s:description: If job not finished fail.

s:processor.name: Is_done
s:processor.s:description: Map job status into true/false is done flag

s:processor.name: checkStatus
s:processor.s:description: Get the status of a submited job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/clustalw2#checkstatus_jobid)

s:metadata.s:description: EBI job identifier for the job to check.
Status of the job.
Sequences to align (fasta format recommended).
User e-mail address.
The alignment in ClustalW format.
Guide tree used to produce the final alignment.
EBI job identifier
Input set of sequences to be aligned.
User e-mail address.
Multiple sequence alignment in ClustalW format.
Neighbour-joining phylogenetic tree in PHYLIP format.

s:processor.name: Clustal_Tcoffee
s:processor.s:description: Perform a multiple sequence alignment using T-Coffee (see http://www.tcoffee.org/). The EBI's WSToffee web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/tcoffee) ise used.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Perform a multiple sequence alignment using T-Coffee (see http://www.tcoffee.org/). The EBI's WSToffee web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/tcoffee) ise used.

s:processor.name: Input_data
s:processor.s:description: Add type information to input.

s:processor.name: Unpack_alignment
s:processor.s:description: Convert byte[] from service into string.

s:processor.name: Contents_list
s:processor.s:description: Wrap input data in list.

s:processor.name: Get_alignment
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/tcoffee#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: runTCoffee
s:processor.s:description: Submit a T-Coffee analysis job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/tcoffee#runtcoffee_params_content)

s:processor.name: Job_params
s:processor.s:description: T-Coffee parameters

s:processor.name: EBI_TCoffee_poll_job
s:processor.s:description: Check job status

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Check WSTCoffee job status.

s:processor.name: Success
s:processor.s:description: Fail if job not done.

s:processor.name: Is_done
s:processor.s:description: Map job status to true/false

s:processor.name: checkStatus
s:processor.s:description: Get the status of a submited job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/tcoffee#checkstatus_jobid)

s:metadata.s:description: EBI job identifier.
Job status
User e-mail address.
EBI job identifer.
T-Coffee alignment in a ClustalW style format.

s:processor.name: Muscle
s:processor.s:description: Perform a multiple sequence alignment using the MUSCLE tool (see http://www.drive5.com/muscle/). The EBI's WSMuscle web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/muscle) is used.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Perform a multiple sequence alignment using the MUSCLE tool (see http://www.drive5.com/muscle/). The EBI's WSMuscle web service (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/muscle) is used.

s:processor.name: Unpack_alignment
s:processor.s:description: Convert byte[] from service into srting.

s:processor.name: Job_params
s:processor.s:description: Parameters for MUSCLE.

s:processor.name: Contents_list
s:processor.s:description: Wrap input data in list

s:processor.name: Input_data
s:processor.s:description: Add type to input sequences

s:processor.name: runMuscle
s:processor.s:description: Submit a MUSCLE analysis job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/muscle#runmuscle_params_content)

s:processor.name: Get_alignment
s:processor.s:description: Get the results of a job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/muscle#poll_jobid_type)

s:processor.name: EBI_MUSCLE_poll_job
s:processor.s:description: Check status of job.

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: Check MUSCLE job status.

s:processor.name: Is_done
s:processor.s:description: Convert status code into true/false.

s:processor.name: Success
s:processor.s:description: Fail if job not complete.

s:processor.name: checkStatus
s:processor.s:description: Get the status of a submited job (see http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/muscle#checkstatus_jobid)

s:metadata.s:description: EBI job identifer for MUSCLE job.
Job status
EBI job identifier.
Alignment produced by MUSCLE, in fasta format.

s:processor.name: fproml
s:processor.s:description: Protein phylogeny by maximum likelihood

s:processor.name: fproml
s:processor.s:description: Protein phylogeny by maximum likelihood

s:processor.name: ClustalW
s:processor.s:description: Multiple alignment program - interface to ClustalW program

s:processor.name: fproml
s:processor.s:description: Protein phylogeny by maximum likelihood

s:workflowdescription.author: Mariana de Oliveira Braga Teixeira Monteiro
s:workflowdescription.title: EMBOSS NJ Tree

s:scufl.s:workflowdescription: This workflow performs a generic protein sequence analysis. In order to do that a novel protein sequence enters into the software along with a list of known protein identifiers chosen by the biologist to perform a homology search, followed by a multiple sequence alignment and finally a phylogenetic analysis.

s:processor.name: fneighbor
s:processor.s:description: Phylogenies from distance matrix by N-J or UPGMA method

s:processor.name: fprotdist
s:processor.s:description: Protein distance algorithm

s:processor.name: fdrawgram
s:processor.s:description: Plots a cladogram- or phenogram-like rooted tree diagram

s:processor.name: fdrawtree
s:processor.s:description: Plots an unrooted tree diagram

s:metadata.s:description: Enter a novel protein sequence. e.g. AITRRVACLDGVNTATNAACCALFAVRDDIQQNL FDGGECGEEVHESLRLTFHDAIGISPSLAATGKFGG GGADGSIMIFDDIEPNFHANNGVDEIINAQKPFVAK HNMTAGDFIQFAGAVGVSNCPGAPQLSFFLGRPA

s:processor.s:description: Protein distance algorithm

s:processor.name: fdrawgram
s:processor.s:description: Plots a cladogram- or phenogram-like rooted tree diagram

s:processor.name: fdrawtree
s:processor.s:description: Plots an unrooted tree diagram

s:processor.name: fneighbor
s:processor.s:description: Phylogenies from distance matrix by N-J or UPGMA method

s:metadata.s:description: Enter a novel protein sequence. e.g. AITRRVACLDGVNTATNAACCALFAVRDDIQQNL FDGGECGEEVHESLRLTFHDAIGISPSLAATGKFGG GGADGSIMIFDDIEPNFHANNGVDEIINAQKPFVAK HNMTAGDFIQFAGAVGVSNCPGAPQLSFFLGRPA

s:processor.name: fproml
s:processor.s:description: Protein phylogeny by maximum likelihood
